page.title: 05Marbles.
page.content: Marbles is a game the children play in the spring and summertime in dry weather.Marbles are glass or china round balls that can be quite small or quite big.You can buy different sorts of marbles and they all have funny names. The smallest marble you can get is a {Littlie Clear},it is a small glass marble with a colour inside.Another small marble is a {Littlie},this is made from glass with different colours inside.A bigger marble is a {Biggie}, this is like a {Littlie}butis larger. A lovely marble is a {Biggie Clear}, they come in many colours made from glass or china.An {Aggie}is a larger version of a {Biggie}.Last of all is my favourite marble called an {Aggie Clear},this is like a {Biggie Clear} but much larger.We play marbles in the playground at break and lunchtime.
